MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an emergency shutdown in the CW8, WA14 and WA16 postcode areas of Knutsford and Altrincham, affecting properties in Mere, Ashley, and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because specialist tree cutters are required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:06 am on 28th December, 2020.
